stories.title: Rust 2.0 preview focuses on async simplicity
stories.summary: Rust core team shares a preview of language-level async ergonomics targeting 2026 stabilization.

stories.title: DIY geothermal cooling for home servers
stories.summary: A maker documents building a closed-loop geothermal system that cools homelab racks for under $2k.

stories.title: Postgres 17 introduces built-in vector indexing
stories.summary: Upcoming PostgreSQL release integrates IVF-Flat indexes, reducing reliance on extensions for AI workloads.

stories.title: Lessons from migrating a bank off COBOL
stories.summary: A financial institution details a five-year journey replacing COBOL with Kotlin services without downtime.

stories.title: Inside the open-source GPU that taped out on Sky130
stories.summary: Engineers release design docs for an open GPU targeting academic workloads using the SkyWater ASIC shuttle.

stories.title: SQLite adds WASM support for browser-native apps
stories.summary: SQLite 3.47 ships with first-party WASM bindings, enabling persistence without backend servers.

stories.title: An SDR-based approach to decoding SpaceX Starlink beacons
stories.summary: Security researchers show how to capture and demodulate Starlink beacon frames using commodity SDR rigs.

stories.title: Scaling LLM evaluation with human preference markets
stories.summary: A research group proposes prediction markets where labelers trade contracts on model quality scores.

stories.title: Rebuilding a PDP-11 from TTL in 2025
stories.summary: Retro computing fans document a modern recreation of the PDP-11/45 using readily available TTL chips.

stories.title: Firefox gets encrypted Client Hello by default
stories.summary: Mozilla enables Encrypted Client Hello (ECH) in Nightly builds, shielding domains from passive observers.

stories.title: How we shrank our container footprint by 80%
stories.summary: Case study showing multi-stage builds, distroless images, and binary slimming delivering dramatic savings.

stories.title: Designing resilient edge networks for wildfire response
stories.summary: Nonprofit details a mesh of LoRaWAN and LTE gateways that kept sensors online during California wildfires.

stories.title: Figma open-sources its vector boolean engine
stories.summary: Figma engineers published the core C++ library powering boolean operations to reduce duplicated work.

stories.title: The math behind 1000x superresolution microscopy
stories.summary: Researchers explain compressed sensing techniques that unlock extreme resolution in live-cell imaging.

stories.title: Practical guide to homomorphic encryption at scale
stories.summary: A startup shares lessons deploying fully homomorphic encryption for secure cloud ML inference.

stories.title: Migrating 30TB of Git history without downtime
stories.summary: Git hosting provider describes an rsync+partial-clone strategy to move petabyte-scale repos live.

stories.title: Teaching compilers SIMD through reinforcement learning
stories.summary: Paper explores using RL agents to generate vectorization heuristics that outperform hand-written rules.

stories.title: An open protocol for portable personal knowledge graphs
stories.summary: Community proposal outlines JSON-LD schemas and sync semantics for interoperable note-taking systems.

stories.title: A 3D-printed wind turbine that fits in carry-on luggage
stories.summary: Maker creates a collapsible turbine providing 120W output for off-grid camping adventures.

stories.title: Reverse-engineering the DMCA takedown ecosystem
stories.summary: Investigative article maps the brokers, bots, and law firms behind mass DMCA requests.
